Rekha, previously married with two daughters, married Lohithashwa a few months ago. He suspected her of infidelity and was upset that she wouldn't send her daughters away.

He praised his team's preparation and fitness to handle back-to-back matches, highlighting their consistent approach to T20 cricket. Simmons remains unfazed by criticism, focusing on the team's confidence and strategy.

title: Glitch or a snub? UN escalator stops the moment Trump & Melania step on it - Watch
description: President Trump dismissed escalator and teleprompter malfunctions at the UN, but the White House demanded an investigation, suspecting sabotage amid funding tensions. UN officials attributed the escalator stoppage to a safety mechanism, while Trump joked about the incidents. The White House views the incidents with suspicion, especially after reports of UN staffers joking about embarrassing Trump.

description: Kerala is facing a rise in brain-eating amoeba infections, but increased detection efforts, including CSF analysis, explain the surge in reported cases. While the condition has a high mortality rate globally, early diagnosis and treatment in Kerala are improving outcomes. Prevention focuses on avoiding nasal exposure to contaminated water sources, as amoebae are widespread and difficult to eliminate entirely.

description: Here is a select list of stories to start the day.

title: Super Typhoon Ragasa: At least 14 dead after Taiwan barrier lake bursts
description: Super Typhoon Ragasa triggered the bursting of a barrier lake in Taiwan's Hualien County, resulting in at least 14 fatalities and 18 injuries. Rescue teams are actively searching for approximately 30 missing individuals after the floodwaters washed away a bridge and inundated a nearby town. Over 7,600 people were evacuated across Taiwan due to the typhoon's impact.

description: Bangladesh’s 2017 “spinner hunt” uncovered a teenage Rishad Hossain, who has since evolved into the country’s brightest wrist-spin prospect. Once ordinary, his discipline and learning curve turned him into a key T20 bowler.

title: 'Hope we can fix': US secretary Rubio on India tariffs after Jaishankar meet

Ryan Routh convicted: Trump assassination plotter tries to stab himself in court
description: Ryan Routh was convicted for plotting to assassinate Donald Trump and then attempted to stab himself in the neck with a pen in court. The incident occurred after the jury's verdict, prompting intervention by US Marshals. Routh faces a life sentence, while his daughter was removed from the courtroom after protesting the proceedings.

title: Entanglement breakthrough brings quantum computers closer
description: In new research published in Science, scientists have demonstrated quantum entanglement between two atomic nuclei separated by about 20 nm

title: Lessons from the history of rebellions in AIADMK and DMK

Sengottaiyan was divested of party posts following his call for the return of estranged leaders, it is a timely moment to revisit some of the most significant uprisings within Tamil Nadu’s two major Dravidian parties

title: Asia Cup: Pak beat SL to keep India vs Pakistan final hopes alive- Scenarios explained
description: Pakistan's crucial win against Sri Lanka keeps the Asia Cup 2025 final berth hopes alive, setting the stage for a potential India vs Pakistan showdown. With India leading the Super Fours, a win against Bangladesh secures their spot and turns Pakistan vs Bangladesh into a virtual semi-final. However, a Bangladesh upset would keep all four teams in contention.

title: CM launches DTC interstate AC e-bus service between Delhi and Baraut in UP

description: Akshay Kumar and Arshad Warsi's 'Jolly LLB 3' witnessed a decent opening, grossing ₹12.5 crore on its first day. Positive word-of-mouth fueled a significant 50% growth on Saturday, followed by further gains on Sunday. Despite an expected Monday dip to ₹5.5 crore due to Navratri festivities, the film rebounded on Tuesday, earning ₹6.5 crore, benefiting from discounted ticket rates.

description: Controlled fusion can only happen in extreme conditions, the kinds that exist inside stars. There are currently two popular ways to achieve this: inertial confinement and magnetic confinement. India is already invested in the magnetic confinement technique as a member of the ITER project, which is building a reactor in France

With Al Horford's expected departure and Kristaps Porziņģis' exit, the Celtics are eyeing a trade with the Utah Jazz. The proposed deal would send guard Anfernee Simons to Utah in exchange for Walker Kessler and Jusuf Nurkić, bolstering Boston's rim protection and interior defense.

Technical glitches and insufficient maintenance have rendered the system redundant, hindering its ability to track tigers and prevent poaching. The failure raises concerns, especially given the suspicious disappearance of five tigers in recent years.

The platform now allows a wider range of content and will offer terminated creators a chance to return.

The bill seeks to address the issue of children aging out of their parents' visas, particularly impacting the Indian diaspora due to green card backlogs.

title: 57 yrs after soldier forced out, widow gets pension
description: The Armed Forces Tribunal (AFT) has directed the government to release arrears of invalid pension to Lance Naik Umrawat Singh's widow from 1968 and family pension from 2011, nearly 57 years after his medical invalidation.

title: ‘We need the brightest minds’: Nvidia, OpenAI CEO defend H‑1B fee; warns US
description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang and OpenAI CEO Sam Altman have both expressed concerns over the recent H-1B visa fee hike, emphasizing the importance of attracting global talent to the U.S. Huang highlighted immigration as the foundation of the American Dream, while Altman focused on streamlining the process to secure the smartest individuals.

title: Kirk threat, missing stalker: Taylor Swift on alert; Kelce busy with NFL
description: Taylor Swift's security team is on high alert as her alleged stalker, Brian Jason Wagner, has disappeared despite a restraining order. Wagner's evasion of authorities and unsettling behavior have prompted heightened security measures, including covert operations at public events. Swift's team prioritizes her safety above all else, adjusting promotional plans and routines until the matter is resolved.

title: US H-1B $100K fees: Netflix founder calls it “tax"; fears will end lotteries
description: Netflix co-founder Reed Hastings supports Donald Trump's new $100,000 H-1B visa fee, a move that contrasts with the widespread criticism from Silicon Valley leaders. While Hastings believes the fee will ensure H-1B visas are reserved for high-value jobs, the White House clarified it's a one-time payment for new petitions only, causing confusion and concern among tech companies, especially startups.
